checks.name: Code-Review
checks.reason: 20 out of last 30 changesets reviewed before merge -- score normalized to 6

documentation.short: Determines if the project requires code review before pull requests (aka merge requests) are merged.

documentation.short: Determines if the project uses static code analysis.

documentation.short: Determines if the project's workflows follow the principle of least privilege.

documentation.short: Determines if the project is published as a package that others can easily download, install, easily update, and uninstall.

Determines if the project has published a security policy.

documentation.short: Determines if the project has generated executable (binary) artifacts in the source repository.
